QuestData.Title: No Bull
QuestData.Description: Twinbraid's patrols always throw us right into the thick of danger. If it's not Horde ambushes, it's a quilboar hit-and-run.$B$BThe problem is them lousy landquaker kodos. Big walkin' walls of fur, shakin' the ground... We can't see or hear an ambush creepin' up on our backside.$B$BGo scare 'em off from our patrol, here. Killing a few should drive the herd south and out of what's left of me hair.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 4 Landquaker Kodos and 1 Landquaker Bull in Southern Barrens.
QuestData.RewardText: I thought you might be responsible for them clouds of dust I saw to the east. Nice work! Them bulls ain't sissies.
